item.description:
This restaurant was recommended by multiple people in the Euro group. It's a French brasserie with an all French wine list.

Money stuff:
There is a fee of $21 to register for the event. Of that, $20 is a deposit, which will be returned to you at the restaurant (in cash). If you say that you're coming and then don't, you forfeit the $20. I'm hoping that having a deposit will eliminate the guessing game about who is actually coming. (So if 12 people RSVP "yes," then 12 people will actually be at the restaurant. I made a reservation for 12.)

The remaining $1 is a non-refundable fee. Part of this goes to Amazon Payments because they charge a transaction fee for the payment, and part of it will go to Meetup to help pay for the group's website.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Our Favorite Restaurant
